material.mattext: Which one of the following matches is false?
Which of the following is an EED?
State which of the following falls under the Ergonomics category of the Machine factor.
Describe why it is important to follow the correct procedure of handling the weapon and ammo.
Human error contributes the most to incidents.
Failure to follow the correct procedures is a punishable offence.
State which of the following is a possible factor that lead to forklift turn overs.
State which of the following is a possible accident involving forklifts.
Describe what should be done to the fork when parking a forklift.
Tilt fork fully forward and lowered to the ground
Tilt fork fully backwards and lowered to the ground
Tilt fork to the right and lowered to the ground
How many hazard divisions of explosives are there?
Why is it important to handle ammunition safely?
Mishandling these items will lead to grave consequences.
Ammunition will not function if not handled safely.
Punishment will be meted out for unsafe behaviors.
It is written in the safety manual.
Describe what may happen when there is improper stacking at ESH.
The ammunition packages may drop and injure personnel.
Ammunition and their boxes may be damaged.
Ammunition packages may drop and cause ammunition scattering.
Which of the following is true of Titanium Tetrachloride?
Can cause blindness when in contact with the eye
Is "Surrender all contraband when handling ammunition" one of the 10 golden rules of ammunition Safety?
Which of the following is an example of a propellant?
What must a person be assigned to destroy blind wear?
In what angle must pen guns and firing of illuminating ammunition be directed?
Which one of the following is not the reason why protective wall made of sandbags must be set up around the blind?
To prevent people from accidentally touching the blind
What is the safety distance for disposal of hand grenades?
What is the safety distance for disposal of projectile up to 100mm?
Which of the following is false regarding field storage of ammunition?
Explosive ordnance will not stored or placed together with POL.
The storage point must be secure and shady.
They are to be stored in their original packing until immediately prior to issue for firing.
The storage point need not be sign posted.
Which sides of a tonner transporting ammunition must have caution labels?
Rough handling of explosive ordnance is forbidden and care must be taken to avoid which of the following?
Slow burning in a confined environment
Rapid burning in a confined environment
Rapid burning in an open environment
Slow burning in an open environment
High explosives has the ability to cause sudden propagation of __________
This ammunition contains a tracer. It is a Live Ammunition.
This ammunition contains a chemical substance. It is a Live Ammunition.
This ammunition contains a smoke substance. It is a Live Ammunition.
This ammunition can produce light effect. It is a Live Ammunition.
This ammunition can produce incendiary effect. It is a Live Ammunition.
An ammunition which when initiated, activates or explodes earlier than expected is called a premature explosion.
Drill Ammunition is an inert Ammunition.
Dummy Ammunition is an inert Ammunition.
A cartridge case containing propellant, gunpowder without a projectile. Its intention is to produce a loud noise on firing when used in training, signalling or salutes. This is a Blank Ammunition.
Fabricating models of ammunition for chambering and loading purposes is not allowed.
Sitting or standing on explosive ordnance and their containers is forbidden.
Mixing initiating explosive ordnance with the main explosive ordnance is not allowed.
Loading live and blank ammunition into the same magazine of weapons is not allowed.
Mixing explosive ordnance belonging to different lots is not allowed.
Mixing uncased and cased explosive ordnance is not allowed.
What is the distance that the troops deployed behind the mine must take cover in a foxhole or behind cover?
Which of the following is/are contraband items?
Which of the following is not allowed?
Stop on the way to buy food while transporting ammunition
Stop on the way to fetch personnel while transporting ammunition
Detour while transporting ammunition as there is still ample time to spare
What is the factor that contributes the most to incidents?
State all the M factors in risk management process.
List the first step of risk management process.
Which stage of a mission is the RAC used?
State all the risk level used in RAC.
Which one of the M factors do "Dangerous Animals" fall under?
Which one of the M factors does "Strong River Current" fall under?
State which M factor that "Absence of Lesson Plan for training" falls under.
State which of the following falls under the Proficiency category of the Man factor.
Man does not have enough rest
State the first thing you need to do before carrying any load.
Bend down to carry the load
Keep both legs near to each other
Keep the load away from your body while lifting
Which of the following is not a possible injury due to incorrect lifting?
What can you do if the load is too heavy to lift?
Break the load up into smaller load if possible
Use equipment to lift the load
State the reason why leg muscles are very important for lifting.
They are the strongest part of our body
They are the nearest to the load
They are the longest muscle in our body
They are the support of our upper body
When there is a fire, we should:
Describe how can safety be enforced in explosives storehouses.
State which of the following is not a safety precaution for forklift.
Do not let anyone stand on the tines
Add additional counterweight on the forklift
State which of the folowing is a pre-operational check when using forklifts.
Ensure that tires are inflated properly.
Check maximum load capacity to ensure that forklift is able to handle load sufficiently.
Check warning devices are functioning properly.
Hand trolleys are allowed for transportation of ammunition.
The affected ammunition is to immersed in water.
Use a pin to pierce a hole in the bag to release the gas outside the storehouse.
No actions need to be taken as it is a common phenomenon.
In the case of eye contact with WP, ____.
The eye is to be flushed with saline solution
The eye is to be flushed with water
Affected personnel must not open his/her eyes
The eye is to be immersed in water
Which of the following is a precaution when handling Titanium Tetrachloride?
Ensure that there is adequate ventilation
Which of the following Safety Requirement at the ESH is true?
Flammable compounds are not be used.
Food and drinks are not allowed in the ESH or APB.
Radio frequency emitting equipment are not allowed.
Which of the following is false for Ammunition Process Work?
Always stack belted ammunition with percussion cap facing each other.
Do not use foreign objects to push rounds into links.
Plastics sheet is placed in between each round link when stacking.
Which of the following is true?
Running with trolley of ammunition packages is not allowed as it may cause damage to both personnel and ammunition boxes.
Running with trolley of ammunition packages is not allowed as it may cause damage to personnel only.
Running with trolley of ammunition packages is not allowed as it may cause damage to the trolley.
Running with trolley of ammunition packages is not allowed as it may cause damage to ammunition boxes only.
_____ gas is generated as a result of a chemcial reaction between the filling and its inherent mositure content.
Which of the following is true?
Do not use force to close the lids or covers of ammunition containers.
When lifting loads, never exert your back muscles to carry the load.
Any ammunition or container damaged during handling must be set aside for inspection.
Which of the following items are allowed in ESH?
Which of the following items are allowed in ESH?
Generates gases at the controlled rates required for propulsion
Produce effects such as light, smoke, sound or flame
Causes sudden propagation of destructive shockwave
Is "Protect ammunition from rain and direct sunlight" one of the 10 Golden Rules of Ammunition Safety?
Is "Do not handle food and drinks with ammunition" one of the 10 Golden Rules of Ammunition Safety?
This ammunition can produce sound effect. It is a Live Ammunition.
Why is it dangerous to tamper ammunition?
Any deviation from the standard instructed way may cause danger to user.
It will reduce its service life
It will be difficult to re-classify the ammunition
Risk is the likelihood that a hazard will cause injury or damage to property.
Hazard is anything that has the potential to cause injury or damage to property.
Which one of the M factors does "Ammunition" fall under?
State the number of passengers allowed on a forklift.
Why is it mandatory for a 44 gallon of water to be placed for storehouses storing white phosphorus ammunition?
The water is used to fight fire.
The water is used to submerge the WP rounds in case of leakage.
The water is used to maintain the humidity in the store house.
The water is used to regulate the temperature of the store house.
The object which is launched through a barrel or launching device by the force of propellant gases is called the projectile.
